body:
This PR removes `sollve`, which is superseded by `llvm-doe` (#20719).

Since #20767 has not been merged. I would like to remove `sollve`. As far as I checked with users, removal is okay (`llvm-doe` should be used instead).

(@clementval, @jdoerfert, @Meinersbur, @vlkale)
title: sollve: remove sollve package
